title: Best of The Program | Guests: Jon Miller & Jason Buttrill | 2/10/20
description:
Happy birthday, Glenn Beck! While Glenn and Stu realize they’re getting older, Joe Biden is older and crankier than ever. But will he drop out of the 2020 race if he comes in fifth in New Hampshire? Buttigieg won Iowa by a small margin, but Bernie is primed to take New Hampshire. BlazeTV’s Jon Miller discusses his controversial tweet about the Oscar win for Bong Joon Ho’s “Parasite” and “woke” Hollywood. And Rudy Giuliani and the Senate are looking into the “smoking gun” we unearthed in “Ukraine: The Final Piece.”
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
